name: Classic Fry Pan
description: A versatile frying pan for everyday cooking.

name: Golden Fry Pan
description: This pan is perfect for frying eggs, pancakes, and more. Its non-stick surface ensures easy cooking and cleaning.

name: Platinum Fry Pan

name: Cast iron skillet pan
description: Our cast iron skillet pan is perfect for cooking meats and vegetables. Its non-stick surface ensures easy cooking and cleaning.
